oracle.adf.share.statemanager
Class DefaultInitialContextFactory

java.lang.Object
  oracle.adf.share.statemanager.DefaultInitialContextFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.naming.spi.InitialContextFactory
public class DefaultInitialContextFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.naming.spi.InitialContextFactory

A simple InitialContextFactory that may be used to acquire an initial DefaultContext for the StateManager. This DefaultInitialContextFactory may be specified when acquiring a new JNDI initial context for looking up a StateManager instance:

Hashtable env = new Hashtable(4); env.put(InitialContext.INITIAL_CONTEXT_FACTORY, "oracle.adf.share.statemanager.DefaultInitialContextFactory"); InitialContext ctx = new InitialContext(env);

Please see DefaultContext for more information about using the default StateManager initial context.
